features: KERATIN SMOOTH SYSTEM: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner for dry hair, with Lamellar-Discipline, transforms unruly hair into sleek, smooth, frizz-defying hair for up to 72 hours
PRO STYLE TECHNOLOGY: Formulated with amino acids and ceramide, this keratin conditioner's tech makes hair 2x stronger and more manageable* with continuous use. *versus a non-conditioning shampoo
ULTIMATE 72 HOUR FRIZZ CONTROL: This anti-frizz conditioner delivers transformative smoothing benefits, so you can forget the frizz and indulge in gorgeously silky hair for up to 72 hours
TRUSTED INGREDIENTS: This TRESemmé hair conditioner, 28oz, is PETA-certified cruelty-free and is free from Parabens, Mineral Oil, and DMDM Hydantoin
HAIR CARE TIPS FROM OUR STYLISTS: Before using the Keratin Smooth hair conditioner, start by shampooing with the Keratin Smooth hair shampoo to transform frizzy hair and achieve a sleek, smooth look
MORE OF WHAT YOU LOVE: With this conditioner, you can enjoy more of the salon-quality formula you love, now in a bigger 28oz bottle
body.description: Don't let unruly frizz ruin your style. There's something about silky hair that's full of natural movement that lets you take on the day with confidence. You can now get that style without having to go to a salon with TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner. This smoothing conditioner for frizzy hair is designed with Lamellar-Discipline technology for smooth, sleek, frizz-defying hair for up to 72 hours. Formulated with amino acids and ceramide, this salon-level Pro Style Technology makes hair 2x stronger, 2x more manageable, and resistant from breakage (vs. a non-conditioning shampoo). Make your hair the perfect style canvas with this keratin smoothing conditioner hair conditioner. Our Keratin Smooth Hair Conditioner, 28 oz, detangles knots and adds softness to make it easy to achieve covetable, confident hair, no matter your hair type or hair need. The end result? Gorgeously silky hair that lasts and lasts. How to use: Step 1: Apply the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo to wet hair, gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather, and rinse. Step 2: Lightly squeeze the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly. This TRESemmé conditioner is free from Parabens, Mineral Oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. Get salon-quality results in every wash. We've always understood that style is more than a look, it's a powerful tool to help you achieve your dreams. With our professional quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at TRESemmé, from the values we promote-such as not testing on animals and being PETA-approved-to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made to give you professional salon quality haircare products you can trust. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So tell your story, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Salon stylists know great style starts with right wash and care foundation. TRESemmé Pro Style Technology, with amino acids and ceramide, works from the inside out and leaves hair strong and manageable*. Make your hair the perfect style canvas. *with continued use.

ULTIMATE FRIZZ CONTROL Our Keratin Smooth System, with Lamellar-Discipline, transforms frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours. STRONG STRANDS READY FOR ANY STYLE These salon-level formulas, with Pro Style Technology, leave hair strong and effortlessly manageable so you have the perfect base to create any style. TRUSTED INGREDIENTS This collection is PETA-approved cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. PROFESSIONAL, SALON QUALITY EVERY TIME TRESemmé is dedicated to creating professional-quality, trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want.

TRESemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo, 28 oz TRESemmé Silky Smooth Shampoo, 28 oz TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Conditioner, 28 oz Main Benefit Looking for smooth, sleek strands? Our Keratin Smooth System, with Lamellar-Discipline, transforms frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours. Say hello to 48 hrs of frizz control and shine with the TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Collection.Made with Argan Oleo Blend,this shampoo,when paired with its conditioner,intensely moisturizes and tames frizz and flyaways,leaving hair silky,soft and smooth. Tame frizz and boost your hair's shine for 48 hrs with the TRESemmé Silky & Smooth Collection. Made with Argan Oleo Blend, this conditioner pairs with its shampoo to intensely moisturize, taming frizz and flyaways to leave hair silky,soft and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My to go conditioner
reviews.reviewText: My daughter hair is super curly. I have been using it for a few years now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great formula conditioner leave my hair very soft and shine good for hair color super recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great smelling keratin product. I have thick hair and this conditioner definitely tames it and makes it feel smooth. Trusted brand name, generous sized bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Slick, Moisture and Frizz Control for Straight and Wavy Hair
reviews.reviewText: It works well as a slickening agent, making it easy to pull tangles out with, and reduce damage through breaking knots.It does moisturize the hair well. It uses dimethicone to do it, so it works well for straight/wavy hair, especially if you shampoo out the cones each shower. It controls frizz nicely throughout the day. Not great for tight curls, though - I would recommend oil-based conditioners over cone-based conditioners in that case.It's a bit thinner than other conditioners I'm used to, so it's a bit easier to get too much out if you're in a hurry.It smells like a typical conditioner, like a light non-specific floral scent with a bit of citrus. The odor isn't strong, and can only be smelt if directly against the nose after showering.Overall, it's a very normal, mainstream conditioner set at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, works well
reviews.reviewText: With my wife and three daughters, our household goes through a lot of hair products. Most of them have fairly straight hair, but my youngest is very curly and kind of in her own little world. Being the youngest, she often just has to deal with whatever is available for her but not anymore! When I saw this, I thought it would be perfect and she has loved it. I mean, she still hates dealing with her hair, but she doesn't complain about it nearly as much as she used to. Some might say it's because she's growing up, but I refuse to let that happen (she is still my little girl after all). No, I believe it is because this conditioner is designed for people just like her. And best of all, it's actually a pretty good value. You could easily pay as much for one small bottle of fancy stuff that you could for this multi pack and it really wouldn't have any noticeable difference. Save yourself the headache (or hairache) and pick this up instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A win for value brands!
reviews.reviewText: Who knew tressemme would win me over like this? I have an emotional attachment to my hair and usually only opt for high-end products. However, upon giving this conditioner a try, I have to admit I'm a believer. It is so silky and immediately makes my hair feel soft and manageable. I recently went on vacation and was pleasantly surprised how quickly this tamed and untangled my gross, tangled, sea-water, beach hair. Usually my hair would be horrid after multiple consecutive days at the beach, but I had zero issues using this product. My hair feels as great as ever. I really recommend this conditioner and will continue using!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size and quantity
reviews.reviewText: I like the quality and size of conditioners, I have enough to last me for a while. It moisturizes the scalp very well and doesn't leave a strong scent. I like to use for deep conditioning hair after wearing braids or twists. I let it sit in for a while under some heat. It is easy to comb through and remove any tangles in the hair. The caps are also very secure on the bottles, so no leakage.
